content.question: The ideas expressed in the excerpt most directly contributed to the

choices.label: emergence of organizations pursuing equality for African Americans
large-scale African American migration to northern cities
expansion of legal segregation by the Supreme Court
persistence of economic discrimination based on race

content.answer: emergence of organizations pursuing equality for African Americans

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
